content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I had not received any new commands or developments since browsing the website and writing the list of top European vacation destinations to a file named "top_european_vacation_destinations.txt". However, I received a command to list files in the current directory. Additionally, I received a command from you to read the file "top_european_vacation_destinations.txt". Command read_file returned a list of top European vacation destinations including Paris, Rome, Swiss Alps, London, Amsterdam, Barcelona, Florence, Prague, Venice, Athens, Mallorca, Vienna, Santorini, Cyprus, Seville, Lake Como, Madrid, Porto, Stockholm, Lisbon, Budapest, Berlin, Reykjavik, Canary Islands, and Amalfi Coast. You also gave a command to search for the best language learning resources on Google.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language", "https://www.alllanguageresources.com/", "https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-best-language-learning-resources", "https://www.lingualift.com/blog/best-language-learning-resources/", "https://nymag.com/strategist/article/how-to-learn-languages-at-home.html", "https://www.mezzoguild.com/tools/", "https://www.fluentu.com/blog/online-language-learning-for-kids/"]'}]
"""
